statements: UPDATE customer_reports SET age = 30 WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE customer_reports SET address = '123 Main St' WHERE customer_id = 2;
UPDATE customer_reports SET buying_behavior = 'Impulsive buyer' WHERE customer_id = 3;
UPDATE customer_reports SET age = age + 1 WHERE customer_id = 101;
UPDATE customer_reports SET buying_behavior = 'Impulsive' WHERE age < 30 AND preference = 'Gadgets';
UPDATE customer_reports SET address = 'New York' WHERE gender = 'Female';
UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'Alice' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE purchases SET quantity = 5 WHERE purchase_id = 100;
UPDATE customers SET email = 'alice@example.com' WHERE customer_name = 'Alice';
UPDATE customers SET age = age + 1 WHERE gender = 'Male';
UPDATE purchases SET price = price * 1.1 WHERE purchase_date < '2022-01-01';
UPDATE customers INNER JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id SET customers.customer_name = 'New Customer Name' WHERE purchases.product_name = 'Product X';
UPDATE customer_demographics SET age = 30 WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE customer_preferences SET preference_desc = 'New preference' WHERE preference_id = 2;
UPDATE customer_buying_behavior SET purchase_amount = 100.50 WHERE behavior_id = 3;
UPDATE customer_demographics SET age = 30, location = 'New York' WHERE customer_id = 123;
UPDATE customer_preferences SET preference_desc = 'Outdoor activities' WHERE customer_id = 456;
UPDATE customer_buying_behavior SET purchase_amount = 150.75, purchase_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE customer_id = 789;
UPDATE customers SET age = 30 WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE purchases SET total_price = 150.75 WHERE purchase_id = 5;
UPDATE demographics SET income = 75000.00 WHERE customer_id = 3;
UPDATE customers SET age = age + 1 WHERE customer_id = 101;
UPDATE purchases SET total_price = total_price * 1.1 WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM demographics WHERE income > 50000);
UPDATE demographics SET marital_status = 'Married' WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM preferences WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND preference_rating >= 4);
UPDATE customers SET age = 30 WHERE customer_id = 'b4536ecf-1c5d-4dab-a63e-7401153144fb';
UPDATE purchases SET quantity = 5, price = 25.99 WHERE purchase_id = 'a546e82b-8589-45a6-8bb6-44a8226ea3a7';
UPDATE preferences SET category = 'Technology', preference_score = 8 WHERE customer_id = 'e967b6b6-23ac-4de7-998a-ded611ed7562';
UPDATE customers SET age = age + 1 WHERE gender = 'Male'
UPDATE purchases SET price = price * 1.1 WHERE purchase_date > '2022-01-01'
UPDATE demographics SET occupation = 'Manager' WHERE income > 100000
